# Codewars Solutions 

### maskify
Mask the last 4 digits of a string 

```
function maskify(cc) {
  const mask = '#';
  const characters = cc.split('');
  const n = characters.length; 
  if (n <= 4) return cc;
  return `${mask.repeat(n-4)}${characters.slice(n-4, n).join('')}`;
}
maskify('helloitsmeadele');
```
